name: iO

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have problems, please contact us at support@ioucys.com
Try using our skill to control your home lighting and other devices via voice control! Just say your commands and iO will execute them.

Here is a step by step guide:

(1). Download the "iO.e" app from the Google Play Store or the iOS App Store.
(2). Start the app and register an account (or log in if you are already registered).
(3). Turn on your iO.e devices and connect them to the "iO.e" app.
(4). IMPORTANT: You can rename the devices using the "iO.e" app. If you name a smart light bulb "living room light", Echo will use the same name after discovering it in step 9 .
(5). Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon or from the Google Play Store or iOS App Store and connect Echo to the "Alexa" app.
(6). In the Alexa Skills directory, search "iO".
(7). Click Enable skill of "iO" and then enter your iO.e account username, password and region on the linked page.
(8). Say to Echo: "Alexa, discover devices".Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(9). Now all settings are completed. Try to talk to Echo to control your devices.


Try saying the following voice commands.

Lighting:
- Alexa, turn on the livingroom light.
- Alexa, turn off the livingroomlight.
- Alexa, dim the livingroom light.
- Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20%.
- Alexa, set livingroom light to green.
*-Alexa, set livingroom light to cool white.
